self_predictions.prediction_summary: Ermes believes he will win easily against Alizhan Muratov, especially if Alizhan stays in the 105kg category. He feels confident in his power and technique.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Ermes thinks Alizhan cannot hook him and will struggle against his pronation.

Alizhan Muratov.strength: Super mega strong, but not enough to hook Ermes
Alizhan Muratov.previous_match_summary: Destroyed Frutnik, but Ermes believes he can dominate him.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Ermes thinks Levan is the favorite due to his size and power, but acknowledges Devon's intelligence and preparation.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Levan's size and power are the main challenges for Devon.

Levan Saginashvili.health: Levan complains about pain in his left arm
Levan Saginashvili.previous_match_summary: Dominant in previous matches, but left arm is untested.

Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Learned from past matches, but power difference is significant.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Ermes believes Vitaly will win due to his power and endurance, especially if Dave is not in top shape.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Vitaly's grip and endurance are key factors.

Vitaly Laletin.previous_match_summary: Close match with Ermes, very strong.

Dave Chaffee.health: Has had ups and downs recently
Dave Chaffee.previous_match_summary: Needs to be in top shape to compete.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Engin agrees with the poll results that Ermes is favored to win, but acknowledges Alizhan's strength.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Ermes' pronation and power are key.

Alizhan Muratov.strength: Super strong, but may not hook Ermes

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Engin thinks Levan is hungrier and more motivated, but Devon is smart and prepared.

Devon Larratt.strength: Very smart, best shape of his life
Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Learned from past losses, very strategic.
